markdownRemark.html:
Hi, my name is Yifei. I currently live in Melbourne working as a software engineer.

In a previous life, I was a biomedical engineer investigating computer guided liver surgery, and a puréer of fruit flies.

You may have also seen me

  • Talking at DDD Melbourne 2018 about using Stripe
  • Mentoring Team Brimbank at CodeForAustralia
  • Doing something? for General Assembly
  • Achieving the 4th highest score at a Space Shooting VR game.

If inclined, you may contact me here.
